# Question 1

\[
\min_{x_1,x_2} \; -8x_1 -16x_2 + x_1^2 + 4x_2^2
\]
subject to
\[
x_1 + x_2 \le 5,\quad x_1 \le 3,\quad x_1 \ge 0,\quad x_2 \ge 0.
\]

```{r q1-qp, echo=TRUE}
library(quadprog)

# objective: min -8x1 -16x2 + x1^2 + 4x2^2
Dmat <- matrix(c(2,0,
                 0,8), 2, 2, byrow = T)
dvec <- c(8,16)

# constraints
Amat <- t(matrix(c(-1,-1,
                   -1, 0,
                    1, 0,
                    0, 1), 4, 2, byrow = T))
bvec <- c(-5,-3,0,0)

sol  <- solve.QP(Dmat, dvec, Amat, bvec)

xopt <- sol$solution
f    <- function(x) -8*x[1] -16*x[2] + x[1]^2 + 4*x[2]^2

cat("x* =", paste(xopt, collapse = ", "), "\n")
cat("f(x*) =", f(xopt), "\n")
```
